mapper.insert: insert into qt_financial_borrow_money_flow (id, borrowId, status, comment, updatedAt) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{borrowId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, borrowId, status, comment, updatedAt from qt_financial_borrow_money_flow
